text: Sa. Kandasamy (23 July 1940 â€“ 31 July 2020) was an Indian novelist and filmmaker. He was born in Tamil Nadu. His 1968 novel Chayavanam was listed by the National Book Trust as a masterpiece in modern Indian Literature. In 1998, Kandasamy was honored with the Sahitya Academy award for his novel Vicharanai Commission. Kandasamy died on 31 July 2020 from a heart attack, aged 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian writers
